cgcloud__RBF_Template__c.name: cgcloud__RBF_Template__c
cgcloud__RBF_Template__c.description: Creation template for Rate-based Funding (RBF) records.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Controls whether the template can be used to create a Rate-Based Funding Record, regardless of User Role.

cgcloud__Anchor_Type__c.description: Customer Anchor Type for the Rate-Based Funding record which drives the visibility for the Anchor attribute.

cgcloud__Condition_Source_KPI__c.description: Condition Source KPI (Lookup to KPI Definition).

cgcloud__Condition_Target_KPI__c.description: Condition Target KPI (Lookup to KPI Definition).

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Currency of the Sales Org assigned to the template.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Fund_Template__c.description: Reference to Fund Template. Template from which the RBF Template determines the fund type.

cgcloud__Internal_Id__c.description: Internal ID is created to ensure that the same short code doesn't correspond to the same Sales Org.

cgcloud__KPI_Set_KPI_Definition__c.description: KPI that's used to populate the Total RBF attribute on the Rate Based Funding.

cgcloud__KPI_Subset__c.description: Allows filtering of KPI Definitions in the GridHierarchyView component.

cgcloud__Rate_Type__c.description: Allows for the various calculation methods of Rate Based Funding KPIs.

cgcloud__Short_Code__c.description: Unique code that's used as a Legacy System reference for integration.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Sort order of the Rate Based Fund template.
